item.source: Valve listed as an exhibitor for Gamescom 2014

item.title: Valve listed as an exhibitor for Gamescom 2014
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
danielsangeo:

Sorry, guys, but at this point, I can’t get excited about something Valve plans to do. I will only get excited about something Valve HAS done. “Rumor has it that Valve will release information about Half Life 3” is not something I take seriously. “Valve provided a release date on Half Life 3” <—THAT’S something to get excited about.

Until that time, however… yawn

It turns out, the release of HL3 is waiting on the completion of an ARG valve planted several years ago. Nobody has yet progressed on it, because they all assume anyone who brings it up is trolling, stupid, or simply overeager.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve listed as an exhibitor for Gamescom 2014

item.title: Valve listed as an exhibitor for Gamescom 2014
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I’ve actually forgotten most of Half-Life 2’s plot, it’s been a while since I gave them a thorough playthrough.

Oh well, soon as we’ve get a release date I’ll go ahead and give 'em a play.

Read full topic

item.title: Valve listed as an exhibitor for Gamescom 2014
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
We’ve all gone from “omg I want it” to “well maybe we’ll get it eventually.” To “if it happens, I guess I’ll get it. Until then, I guess I’ll play Episode 2 over and over and over and over…”
